summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3231 for the improvement of West 60th Street, from 14th Avenue Northwest to 26th Avenue Northwest, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 40072, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
